birthday.definition: The birthday. Age can be inferred from the date of recording.

definition: Describing the subject which underwent the experiment.

developmental_stage.definition: The developemtal stage of the subject. E.g. 'embroyonal', 'adult', 'larval' etc.

genus.definition: The Genus of the studied subject.

health_status.definition: Information about the health status of this subject.

label.definition: If the subject has been labled in a specific way. The lable can be described here.

population.definition: The population this subject is offspring of. This may be the bee hive, the ant colony, etc.

species.definition: The scientific name of the species e.g. Apis mellifera, Homo sapiens.

strain.definition: The strain the subject was taken from. E.g. a specific genetic variation etc.

trivial_name.definition: The trivial name of the species like Honeybee, Human.
